amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the 6 month moratorium on rules imposed by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-388 to strike section 653 as created by Title II of the bill (Requirement for Rules to Appear in Agency-Specific Monthly Publications).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 244 (Roll no. 8).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 244 (Roll no. 8).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cummings.
